response.summary:
Industries experience: Automotive, Business Process Outsourcing, Personal Care & Cosmetics, Educational and Finance, Consulting and Insurance.

Divisions experience: Project & Purchasing Management, Training & Development, Commercial Planning, Research, Business Intelligence, FP&A and OPEX.

MSc in Industrial Engineering at the Universidad Nacional de Colombia - Thesis: Default risk prediction in Income Share Agreements. 

Data Science Coursera Specialization.

Personal interests: Sustainability and Education.

Passions: Tourism, Dancing, Swimming, Cycling and Yoga.
response.skills: Portuguese, German, Análisis de datos, Microsoft Office, Investigación y desarrollo, Redacción de Informes, Capacidad de análisis, Ciencia de datos, Gestión de proyectos, Aprendizaje automático, Microsoft Word, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Project, Trabajo en equipo, Aptitudes para la comunicación, Inglés, Mejora de procesos, Decision-Making, Statistical Data Analysis, Financial Analysis

profile_positions.description:
-	Elaboración, análisis y presentación mensual & trimestral del Estado de Resultados (P&L) para diferentes líderes: financieros & de líneas de negocio tanto globales como regionales.

-	Acompañamiento a O&T en el análisis y la optimización de la estructura de Datos entre sistemas comerciales, fiduciarios, contables y financieros (EPM).
-	Optimización de procesos operativos de FP&A.

company.name: Marsh McLennan
company.description:
Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC) is the world’s leading professional services firm in the areas of risk, strategy and people. The Company’s more than 85,000 colleagues advise clients in 130 countries.  With annual revenue of over $20 billion, Marsh McLennan helps clients navigate an increasingly dynamic and complex environment through four market-leading businesses. Marsh provides data driven risk advisory services and insurance solutions to commercial and consumer clients. Guy Carpenter develops advanced risk, reinsurance and capital strategies that help clients grow profitably and pursue emerging opportunities. Mercer delivers advice and technology-driven solutions that help organizations redefine the world of work, reshape retirement and investment outcomes, and unlock health and wellbeing for a changing workforce. Oliver Wyman serves as a critical strategic, economic and brand advisor to private sector and governmental clients. 

Follow us on Twitter at @marshmclennan.
